text:
我给所有的客户保证：我绝对不会以假充正，假货当正品卖的是最可耻可恨的！ 我绝对不会漫天要价，我只赚我该赚的那点点利润！！ 因为我不仅是要长久做生意的，更重要的是希望能够真心的和大家交个朋友。 我这里没有套路，只有真诚！
而我给出更重要的承诺是：支持到付，7天无理由退换！ 让您购物更放心！
您可添加我为徽信好友
trans:
I give all my customers a guarantee: I will never sell fakes as originals. Selling fake goods as genuine is the most disgraceful and hateful thing! I definitely won't overcharge; I'll only make the small profits I deserve! Because not only do I want to build a long-lasting business, but more importantly, I sincerely hope to make friends with everyone. There are no tricks here, only sincerity!
The more important commitment I make: I offer cash on delivery and a 7-day no-questions-asked return policy! This way, you can shop with greater peace of mind!
You can add me as a friend on WeChat
